title: 235. Who Needs Handwriting?
description: The digital age is making pen and paper seem obsolete. But what are we giving up if we give up on handwriting?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: The digital age is making pen and paper seem obsolete. But what are we giving up if we give up on handwriting?
